column5: Located close to the J.W. Marriott, it is a perfect alternative to having to stay at the hotel for conferences. Close to I-35, 1604, and 281. The room has its own AC unit, 2 comfortable beds, desk, drawers, tv and bathtub.  We are not only located minutes from TPC Golf Course (hosts the Valero Texas Open) and the J.W. Marriott, we are 16 miles from the Natural Bridge Caverns and the Natural Bridge Wildlife Ranch. Also, shopping is only a short drive away.
column8: Master bedroom close to Northside highlights
